$listeners.desc: All native events are being propagated (you don't need the '.native' modifier)

tag.desc: HTML tag to render; Suggestion: use 'label' when encapsulating a QCheckbox/QRadio/QToggle so that when user clicks/taps on the whole item it will trigger a model change for the mentioned components

horizontal.desc: Display a horizontal section (will have no padding and can contain other QCardSection)

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component
